response.answer_text: Writing can be a great career. It takes time to become a writer, and you have to put effort in just like you would with any other profession. (People seem to forget this. They think it’s just typing words on a keyboard, but there’s a lot more to it than that!) If you’re going to expend the effort getting a job, it might as well be doing something you love. And if you can get a job as a freelancer or writer, or even create a writing job for yourself through a blog, why not? Most people I’ve met who are writers love their job. They might not love it all the time, and every job has its challenges, but they’re happy for the most part. Some people are just hardwired for this career path. And they all started out writing for love of their craft, whether they were paid for it or not. Happy writing!

I looked up the word, “career” in my Webster’s Seventh New Collegiate Dictionary. Here is what is states: “a profession for which one trains and for which is undertaken as a permanent calling.” That clearly excludes certain occupations that do not require education, training, expertise, etc. Now, do you consider “writing a career?” YES! Absolutely! I have never known anyone who writes who has never been a reader nor has studied writing as a mechanical obsession. Writers can work at writing and I have read biographical information about successful writers, both in the past and currently alive, that began as journalists and/or creative writers. Not all become household names and famous for all time, but many/most make a living at creating creative streams on a page.

It was for me. I never saw it as a calling or dream of becoming a writer. I just stumbled onto it as a way to make money to supplement my professor salary that was being eroded by double-digit inflation. I had to so something for money because I was teaching for love. 😀 Once I realized that I had a talent for writing I put more effort into it and it turned out well. It delivered me from the politics and BS of academia at age 47 in 1989.🙏🏽

Yes it is. In today’s era, writing is one of the best carrier options.If you are good at writing, you must go for writing carrier. By this,your writing skills will improve as well as you can earn money.
